$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/history
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-Favorites/#ChangeLog

* ''4.7.9 '' -- 2022.11.04 -- bug fixes in slider button and toolbar button
* ''4.7.6 '' -- 2022.10.20 -- create sidebar tab from folder
* ''4.7.4 '' -- 2022.10.07 -- folder button modifiers and draggable handle (secret keys) added  
* ''4.7.1 '' -- 2022.08.25 -- folders are highly improved, export as bundle, special viewtemplate, button modifiers. 
* ''4.6.5 '' -- 2022.08.14 -- updated to Tiddlywiki 5.2.3 and restructured for performance. 
* ''4.5.1 '' -- 2020.05.16 -- new svg icon for toolbar and correction for svg color
* ''4.5.0 '' -- 2020.04.23 -- updated to Tiddlywiki 5.1.23 and fixed few issues
* ''4.3.0 '' -- 2019.11.19 -- correct caption when caption filed has wikitext
* ''4.0.0 '' -- 2019.12.17 -- a rewrite of old favorite plugin
* ''3.0.12'' -- 2018.11.01 -- released by Mohammad Rahmani
* ''3.0.5 '' -- 2017.08.03 -- released by Andrew Harrison

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo-search
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo.text:
\define standardSearch() [all[tiddlers+shadows]tagget[list]enlist-input[]search] \define filterSearch() [all[tiddlers+shadows]tagget[list]enlist-input[]]+[subfilter] \define displayResult(filter) <$set name=itemsFound filter=<<__filter__>> > <$list filter="[enlistlimit[1]]" variable=null emptyMessage='// no result for this folder//
'> <$list filter="[subfilter]" variable=folder> <$list filter="[list] :intersection[enlist] :and[limit[1]]">
<$transclude tiddler=<> field=caption/>
<$list filter="[list] :intersection[enlist]"> <$link to=<>/>
\end \define combo-search(stateTiddler:"") <$vars pattern="^\[" stateTid={{{ [[$:/temp/favorites/combosearch/]addsuffix[$stateTiddler$]] }}}>
<$keyboard key=escape actions='<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>' > <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag=input default="" placeholder="search by keyword or filter" class="sltext"/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions='<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>'> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$set name=searchTerms tiddler=<> field=text> <$list filter="[trim[]minlength[3]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="
//Search text too short//" variable=null>
<$list filter="[regexpthen[filterSearch]else[standardSearch]]" variable=searchMethod > <$reveal type=nomatch default="filterSearch" text=<> > <$macrocall $name=displayResult filter=<> /> <$reveal type=match default="filterSearch" text=<> > <$macrocall $name=displayResult filter=<> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/defin.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/defin.text:
\define folderpath()     $:/favorites/folders
\define foldertagTid()   $:/tags/Favorites/Folder
\define folders()        [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$(foldertagTid)$]]
\define recentlyAdded()  $:/favorites/folders/recent

\define temppath()       $:/temp/favorites

\define selectionTid()   $(temppath)$/selection
\define tempNewTid()     $(temppath)$/new-folder
\define temppopupTid()   $(temppath)$/delete-confirm
\define tempreorderTid() $(temppath)$/reorder
\define saveTid()        $(temppath)$/savetitle

<!-- slide in fav-tree macro -->
\define sliderRevealState() $(temppath)$/slider/$(currentFolder)$

<!-- for rename folder -->
\define stateFolderEdit()    $(temppath)$/folder-editor/$(currentFolder)$
\define tempFolderTextEdit() $(temppath)$/folder-editor/edit-text/$(currentFolder)$

<!-- config tiddlers-->
\define openFolderOnDrop()             $:/config/favorites/FolderOpenOnDrop
\define expandFolderModifierKey()      $:/config/favorites/modifierkey/expand-folder
\define openFolderModifierKey()        $:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder
\define openFolderItemsModifierKey()   $:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder-items
\define sidebarTabfromFolderModifierKey()  $:/config/favorites/modifierkey/sidebar-tab-from-folder

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/drag-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/drag-n-drop
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/drag-.text:
\whitespace trim \define drop-actions() <$reveal type="nomatch" default="" text={{{ [listed[]tag] }}} > <$vars oldFolder={{{ [listed[]tag!match] +[limit[1]]}}} > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$list filter="[get[text]match[yes]]" variavle=null> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="open"/> \end \define placeholder()
 
\end \define droppable-item-after-last-item() \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<> > <>
 
\end \define display-folder-is-empty() <$droppable actions=<> enable=<> > <> //Folder is empty// \end

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/fav-t.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/fav-tree
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/fav-t.text:
\define fav-tree(status:"closed")
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="open" default="$status$" tag="div" > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=<> dragFilter="[list]" > {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="open" default="$status$" tag="div" > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=<> dragFilter="[list]" > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[match[yes]] :filter[!match]" variable=null emptyMessage=""" <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-title-view"/> """> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-title-edit"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-clear-btn"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-rename-btn"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-delete-btn"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-reorder-btn"/>
<$reveal type="match" state=<> text="open" default="$status$" tag=div class="kk-fav-folder-content"> <$list filter="[list]" template="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/list-item" emptyMessage=<> /> <> \end \define slider-btn-actions(status) <$list filter="[match[normal]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$status$"/> <$list filter="[match{$(expandFolderModifierKey)$}]"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$(temppath)$/slider/]]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/favorites/slider/$:/favorites/folders/recent" text=closed/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=open/> <$list filter="[match{$(openFolderModifierKey)$}]"> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="yes"/> <$list filter="[match{$(openFolderItemsModifierKey)$}]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=open/> <$list filter="[listreverse[]]" > <$action-navigate $to=<> /> <$list filter="[match{$(sidebarTabfromFolderModifierKey)$}]"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle = {{{ [get[title]addsuffix[-as-sidebar-tab]] }}} caption = {{{ [get[caption]] }}} tags = "$:/tags/SideBar" text = "{{$(currentFolder)$||$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ViewTemplate/Folder}}" /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folder-create
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.text:
\define add-folder-add-actions()
<$list filter="[<tempNewTid>get[text]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable=null>
<$vars 
  folderName = {{{  [<tempNewTid>get[text]] }}} 
	saveTitle  = {{{[<saveTid>get[text]]}}} >
<$action-createtiddler 
  $basetitle=<<unusedtitle baseName:"$(folderpath)$/f" separator:"-" template:"$basename$$separator$$count:3$">>
	$savetitle=<<saveTid>>
	caption=<<folderName>>
	tags=<<foldertagTid>> />
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<foldertagTid>> $field="list" $subfilter="[<saveTid>get[text]]" />
<!-- delete temp tiddler to clear inputbox-->
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<tempNewTid>>/>
</$vars>
</$list>
\end

\define add-folder-cancel-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<tempNewTid>>/>

\define new-fav-folder-inputbox()
<$keyboard key=enter  actions=<<add-folder-add-actions>>    >
<$keyboard key=escape actions=<<add-folder-cancel-actions>> >
<$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<tempNewTid>> default="" placeholder="enter a folder name" class="kk-fav-input"/>
</$keyboard>
</$keyboard>
\end

\define new-fav-folder-cancelButton()
<$list filter="[<tempNewTid>get[text]minlength[1]limit[1]]"><!-- clear button -->
<$button tooltip="clear input box" class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn-mini" actions=<<add-folder-cancel-actions>>>
{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
</$button>
</$list>
\end

\define new-fav-folder-addButton()
<$button tooltip="create new folder" class="tc-btn-invisible" 
actions=<<add-folder-add-actions>> disabled= {{{ [<tempNewTid>get[text]!is[blank]then[no]else[yes]] }}}>
{{$:/core/images/new-button}}
</$button>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folder-delete
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.text:
\define folder-delete-actions()
<$wikify name=warning-message text='Do you wish to delete "{{$(currentFolder)$!!caption}}" folder ($(currentFolder)$)?'>
<$action-confirm $message=<<warning-message>> >
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<foldertagTid>> $field="list" $subfilter="-[[$(currentFolder)$]]" />
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentFolder>>/>
	</$action-confirm>"""
</$wikify>	
\end	
<!-- why wikify is used? the confirm message uses browser message and they does not support Wikitext! so we need to wikify everyhting before passing to $message -->

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folder-reorder
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folde.text:
\define folder-reorder() <$let selectedFolder={{{ [get[text]] }}} disabledStatus={{{[taglimit[1]then[no]else[yes]]}}} >
<$list filter="[match[no]]" variable=null emptyMessage="//First select a folder//"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field=caption/>
<$button tooltip="move down" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="+[move:1]"/> <$button tooltip="move up" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="+[move:-1]"/> <$button tooltip="put first" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/fold-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[] [] +[putfirst:1[]]"/> <$button tooltip="put last" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[] [putlast:1[]]"/> <$button tooltip="sort downwards" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/unfold-all-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="+[sort[caption]]"/> <$button tooltip="sort upwards" disabled=<> >{{$:/core/images/fold-all-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="+[!sort[caption]]"/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filterbuttons/exptab-bundle
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.text:
\define bundle-folder()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export folder and tiddlers as bundle"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/stack}}
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" 
   $param="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/export-bundle"
   exportFilter=<<exportFilter>>
   folderpath=<<folderpath>>
   foldertags=<<foldertagTid>>
   foldercaption= {{{ [<selection>get[caption]addprefix[Exported ]] :else[[Exported favorites]]}}}
   filename="Favorites_Folder_Exported.json"
/>
</$button>
\end


<$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text=<<resultCount>> ><!--display button if there is a result-->
<$set name=exportFilter filter=<<selectionFilter>> >
<<bundle-folder>>
</$set>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filterbuttons/exptab-delete
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.text:
<$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text=<> > <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="delete all tiddlers in this folder"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
Are you sure you wish to delete permanently <> tiddler(s)?
<$button class="tc-button tt-button"> delete <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> <$list filter="[match[singleFolder]then] :else[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag]" > <$action-deletefield $field="list"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filterbuttons/exptab-export
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/filt.text:
<$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text=<<resultCount>> ><!--display button if there is a result-->
<$set name=exportFilter filter=<<selectionFilter>> >
<$macrocall $name="exportButton"  exportFilter=<<exportFilter>> lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/" baseFilename="favorites"/>
</$set>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs/export
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.caption: Export
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ Export or delete favorite tiddlers <$let selection= {{{ [get[text]] }}} selectionType={{{ [match[allFavorites]then[allFavorites]else[singleFolder]] }}} allFavoritesFilter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tagget[list]enlist-input[]]" singleFolderFilter="[list]" selectionFilter={{{ [match[singleFolder]thenelse] }}} resultCount= {{{ [subfiltercount[]] }}} >
<$select tiddler=<> field="text" default="message" class="kk-fav-select"> <$list filter=<> > <$list filter="[subfiltercount[]!match[0]]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Manager/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]"><$transclude/>
<> <$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text={{{[subfiltercount[]]}}} > <$list filter=<> template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs/folders
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.caption: Folders
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition
\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Macro/Folder]]

<!-- Create the UI --->

Create, delete, rename, and rearrange folders

<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-create"  />
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-reorder" />

<$vars fv-config-buttons=yes>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-tree" field=text/>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs/search
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.caption: Search
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/tabs.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo-search

Search in favorites list (use filter or standard search)

<<combo-search favorites>>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme.text:
; Favorites
A favorite item also called a bookmark is a shortcut, you are creating for quick access to it. You can access that bookmark at any time and view that as many times as you want without having to search and find it again.

Favorites plugin is a set of tool for creating favorites (bookmarks) in Tiddlywiki. Each favorite item is a shortcut to a tiddler. Favorites can be organized in folders.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Favorites/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Favorites

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.text:
<$list filter="[<tempFolderTextEdit>get[text]minlength[1]limit[1]]" variable=null><!-- clear button -->
<$button tooltip="cancel rename folder" class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn-mini"
actions=<<rename-cancel-actions>>
>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</$button>
</$list>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-rename-btn
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.text:
<$reveal stateTitle=<<stateFolderEdit>> type="nomatch" text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<<stateFolderEdit>> setTo="edit">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempFolderTextEdit>> $field="text" $value={{{[<currentFolder>get[caption]]}}}/>
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal stateTitle=<<stateFolderEdit>> type="match" text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<<rename-perform-actions>> disabled={{{ [<tempFolderTextEdit>get[text]trim[]minlength[1]then[no]else[yes]] }}}>{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</$button>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-reorder-btn
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.text:
\define check-actions()
<!-- Save the current ordering of the tiddlers with this tag -->
<$set name="order" filter="[<foldertagTid>tagging[]] -[<recentlyAdded>]">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<foldertagTid>> $field="list" $filter="+[enlist<order>]">
</$set>
\end
<$radio tiddler=<<tempreorderTid>> field=text value=<<currentFolder>> actions=<<check-actions>> class="kk-fav-btn-radio"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-title-edit
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.text: <$reveal stateTitle=<> type="nomatch" text="edit" tag="div" class="kk-fav-title"> <$droppable actions=<> enable=<> > <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"/> <$reveal stateTitle=<> type="match" text="edit" tag="div"> <$keyboard key=enter actions=<> > <$keyboard key=escape actions=<> > <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag="input" default={{{[get[caption]]}}} placeholder="enter a folder title" focus=yes class="kk-fav-input"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/folder-title-view
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/fo.text: <$droppable actions=<> enable=<> tag="div"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"/>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini kk-fav-close-btn" tooltip="remove item from favorites">
{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentFolder>> $field="list" $subfilter="-[<currentTiddler>]"/>
</$button>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/it.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/item-link-btn

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/li.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/list-item
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/li.text:

<$droppable actions=<<drop-actions>> enable=<<tv-enable-drag-and-drop>> >
<<placeholder>>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/item-delete-btn" field=text/>

</$droppable>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-tree
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition
\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Macro/Folder]]

<$list filter=<<folders>> variable="currentFolder">
<$macrocall $name="fav-tree" status={{{ [<currentFolder>match<recentlyAdded>then[open]else[closed]] }}} />
</$list>
<!-- all folder with closed status except recentlyAdded -->

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.text: \whitespace trim \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition]] \define add-this-tiddler() [[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[putfirst[]] \define remove-this-tiddler() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define show-favorites-button(class) \whitespace trim <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}} <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}/> \end \define btn-add-to-favorites() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="notselected"/> \end \define btn-remove-from-favorites() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Remove}} class=<> > <$action-listops $tiddler={{{[subfiltercontainslimit[1]]}}} $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="selected"/> \end <$list filter="[all[current]listed[]taglimit[1]]" variable=null emptyMessage=<> > <>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.text:
\define checked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab" tags=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove" tags=""/> 
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab"/> 
\end

\define unchecked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove" tags="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"/> 
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab"/> 
\end

These settings let you customize the behaviour of the Favorites plugin.

---

;Show Favorites setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/favorites/FolderOpenOnDrop" field="text"
    checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Open folder on drop item</$checkbox>
:<input type="checkbox" disabled> Viewtoolbar icon color <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" 
	field="text" tag="input" type="color" class="kk-fv-color-input"/> <$list filter="[[$:/config/favorites/IconColor]get[text]!match[#ff0000]]" variable=null>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" tooltip="Reset viewtoolbar icon color">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}}
    <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" text="#ff0000" />
  </$button>
	</$list>
	 
;Freeze favorites
:<$checkbox checkactions=<<checked-frozen>> 
   tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"
	 checkactions=<<checked-frozen>>
	 uncheckactions=<<unchecked-frozen>> > Enable frozen tab</$checkbox>

;Shortcuts
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Expand folder, collapse other</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/expand-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like ctrl" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Open folder in story river</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Open folder items in story river</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder-items" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Create a sidebar tab from folder</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/sidebar-tab-from-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Macro/Folder]] \define show-options() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" to="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/manager"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} Manager \end \define colapse-all() <$list filter="[prefix[$(temppath)$/slider/]!suffix] :filter[{!!text}match[open]] :and[limit[1]]" variable="null"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" tooltip="collapse all folders, open Recently added" actions='<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$(temppath)$/slider/]]"/>' > {{$:/core/images/fold-button}} \end
---  <> <>

<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-tree" field=text/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/f.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/f.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/f.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Macro/Folder]]
<$set name="tv-enable-drag-and-drop" value="no"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-tree" />

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ViewTempl.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ViewTemplate/Folder
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ViewTempl.text:
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<folded-state>> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Folder]]">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtemplates/ui-folder-tiddler" mode=block/>
</$list>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtemplate.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtemplates/ui-folder-tiddler
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtemplate.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/drag-n-drop \define tempInput() $:/temp/favorites/add-bulk/$(currentTiddler)$ \define inputFilter() [subfilter{$(tempInput)$}] :filter[is[tiddler]] \define actionFilterAdd() [all[current]get[list]enlist-input[]] [subfilter{$(tempInput)$}] \define actionFilterRemove() [all[current]get[list]enlist-input[]] -[subfilter{$(tempInput)$}] \define actionDeleteTemp() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \define add-remove-bulk-items() <$button tooltip="Append items to this folder" disabled={{{ [subfilter{$(tempInput)$}has[title]limit[1]then[no]else[yes]] }}} actions='<$action-listops $filter=<> />' > Append <$button tooltip="Remove items from this folder" disabled={{{ [subfilter{$(tempInput)$}has[title]limit[1]then[no]else[yes]] }}} actions='<$action-listops $filter=<> />' > Remove \end Add, remove bulk of items
<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<> > <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag="input" type="search" default="" placeholder="enter a filter like [tag[doc]]"/> <>
FIltered items: //<$count filter=<>/> mathches//
<$list filter=<> template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
Contents of folder: ''{{!!caption}}''
<$vars currentFolder=<> > <$list filter="[list]" emptyMessage=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/list-item"/> <>
